not_first_welcome_title: We are glad to see you again!
not_first_welcome_subtitle: Hope you are doing great and can't wait to discover more stars!
welcome_subtitle: Feel out of the Earth and discover stars in the elevating journey straight to the skies!
info: As more data from a particular sol is downlinked from the spacecraft (sometimes several days later), these values are recalculated, and may not be comparable to latest Earth days.
help_subtitle_1: See latest collected weather from Mars. Swipe right to see more days.
help_subtitle_2: Like favourite astronomy images by double tap and save it
help_subtitle_3: In "Liked images" look go over saved images and delete if needed.
